Thanks for playing and we can't wait to hear what you think!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":0,"totalDownVotes":0,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":3504,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":10885371,"creatorName":"i_studioman","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":0,"totalDownVotes":0,"universeId":3258251641,"name":"(D4C:LT) Stand Upright: Rebooted","placeId":8540168650,"playerCount":1657,"imageToken":"T_8540168650_2515","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Bugs are not very present, lets go!!1 (If you do find a bug please report it in our community server.)

In-game commands currently:
/check [playername]
/trade [playername]
/handitem [playername]
/dropitem
/mount (only works if you own a mount.)
/unmount

Game gets frequent updates.
Shutdown = Update

Head Developer/Scripter: i_stabman
Animator(s): admpn
Modeler(s): Legend_Cario, slime868111
Contributors: THANOSMELLBAD (Inner Sanctum Building), FredDey_Z (Artwork)
You need to buy the game passes from Original Stand Upright to use them here.
Original SU to buy gamepasses from: https://www.roblox.com/games/4519240880/Stand-Upright-testing
(Note, this process is automatic, meaning that once you buy a gamepass from SU, you will immediately have it in SU:R.)

If you notice that your assets may be in SU:R and you want them removed, feel free to contact us.

This remake was mostly inspired by Stand Upright in around July 2020.","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":0,"totalDownVotes":0,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":1854,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Lock and Load with the exclusive Virtual Nomad Bundle through Prime Gaming and unlock six unique functionalities: Character Skin, Custom Emote, Weapon Skin, Elimination Effect, Melee Weapon, and Calling Card

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select “Redeem Item” to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5522949,"creatorName":"Powerful Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":0,"totalDownVotes":0,"universeId":3258302407,"name":"[🎫SEASON 2!] Rebirth Champions X","placeId":8540346411,"playerCount":1791,"imageToken":"T_8540346411_8519","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎁 NEXT CODE AT 150000 LIKES! 💖
